sect1.title: Accessing the Program
sect1.para:
Gpe-Screen-Setup is accessable in the settings folder. To access it tap on the Screen Setup icon.
GPE Main Screen
Main Application Screen

sect1.title: Using the Application
sect1.para:
Here you can ajust the backlight settings and screen orientation.
Bightness: Drag the slider to ajust the current brightness of the screen. (0-100)
Touchscreen: Press this button to re-callibrate your screen.
There are four different screen orientations available:
Portrait, or 'normal' orentation. The menu bar is at the base of the screen and the title bar on top.
Landscape-Left. The menu bar is at the top of the screen and the title bar is at the left.
Inverted. The menu bar is at the top of the screen and the title bar at the base.
Landscape-Right. The menu bar is at the bottom of the screen and the title bar on the right.
Quick Tip
You can also re-callibrate your screen by pressing the record button at the login screen. (May not be available on all handhelds)
Feature
Orientation can be adjusted on the fly, no reboot of the handheld is neccesarry.
